mean_cn: vt. 使推迟，使延期；  vi. 延期
mean_en: to choose to do (something) at a later time
word_etyma: de取消 + fer带来 → 暂不带来 → defer 延期；
sentence: The government deferred the male citizens' retirement age from 60 to 65.
sentence_trans: 政府把男性的退休年龄从原来的60岁延迟到了65岁。
sentence_phrase: deferred the male citizens' retirement age
